text: @JustinTrudeau @POTUS This morning, I grovelled to POTUS.  We focused on my no-show at USMCA, the Covid19 pandemic, which I screwed up, and Hong Kong, which I am really glad China took over.  We discussed All Lives Matter except white conservatives and the need for me to promote racism to win elex 43.
